page.title: 03HANDCROSS C.P SCHOOL
page.content: Handcross C.P School was opened in 1878.There are 3 Classes.There is a dining room,a staff room,an office,girls and boys toilets.The children start at 5 and leave at 11.We have 2 cooks and 2 cleaners.There are 2 full time teachers 1 headmistress and a part time teacher.There are 62 children in the school.We have a playground and we go to the recreation ground for games.We play netball,football,rounders and we have a swimming pool.In the summer we go camping.We have sports day which is in June.We go swimming every Tuesday at Crawley swimming pool.The fourth years go to France once a year.We have a computer which is a BBC Microcomputer and a video for recording things on television.
